name: Leave Me Alone !
description:
A child just want to be alone... but the souls keep nagging him.

He has to find a way out trough two strange rooms and to resolve some weird puzzles in order to run away far from them (maybe...)

***

"Leave me alone !" is a short game, inspired by some point and click games, made in a few days for the Unexpected Jam (Aug 29 - Sep 2020).

***

HOW TO PLAY ? You only need to use the mouse and sometime the keyboard.

***

GAME CONTENT WARNING : spooky ambiance and blood.

***

CREDIT:  - programming/drawing : Overtired_FOX

                    - music/sound from www.zapsplat.com
